Grand Expectation: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.
Impasse Conqueror: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.
Unstoppable Fervor: Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Unexpected Odyssey: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed. This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.
True Explorer: Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
Fire Ventures with Me: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.
